name: Google-Maps-iOS-SDK-for-Business
summary: Google Maps SDK for Business: iOS.
description: Use the Google Maps SDK for iOS to add interactive maps, and immersive Street View panoramas, to your business app.

license.text:
If you use the Google Maps SDK for Business: iOS in your application, you must
      include the attribution text as part of a legal notices section in your
      application. Including legal notices as an independent menu item, or as
      part of an "About" menu item, is recommended.

      You can get the attribution text by making a call to
      [GMSServices openSourceLicenseInfo].
